rules.name: all_null_stats
rules.rule: select dt, case when rowIsAllNull(struct(*)) then 1 else 0 end as isAllNull from user_action where dt=date_sub(current_date(), 1)

rules.name: all_null_count
rules.rule: select dt, sum(isAllNull) as c from all_null_stats group by dt

rules.name: total_count
rules.rule: select dt, count(*) as c from all_null_stats group by dt

rules.name: all_null_ratio
rules.rule: select (all_null_count.c / total_count.c) as all_null_ratio from all_null_count inner join total_count on all_null_count.dt = total_count.dt
